heading: Submittal documents required for foundations and earthwork
text:
Prior to the issuance of any permit for work that
   includes foundations and/or earthwork, submittal documents clearly illustrating support of excavation design, including but not
   limited to stepping, sheeting, sloping, shoring, and bracing, and any protective railings or equipment required by chapter 33 of
   the New York city building code shall be required.
